diff_act: 2.route through the speaker system until the driver picks up the handset
3.continue until terminated by the driver who initiated the call
4.Continue the call until ended by the calling driver
5.Alert the driver with an audible indication if the system is not able to connect the call.

regen.new_specification: The system shall provide a visual indication to the driver if the system is not able to connect the call.

regen.absent_element: No absent element detected due to existing specification coverage.
regen.new_specification: No new specification is necessary beyond current complete coverage.

regen.absent_element: situation when train exits group call area before call connects
regen.new_specification: If a train exits the group call area before call connection is established, the system shall provide audible and visual indications to inform the driver of the issue.

label: If the system is not able to connect the call, an audible and visual indication shall be provided to the driver.
absence: the visual indication shall be provided
